title: Freezing!!!
body:
So, since about patch 5.6 I have been getting annoying freezes. I just walk around the map and suddenly I freeze, the game says, "Reconnecting" except everything around me still goes normally. This is so annoying and I wanted to start ranked but if I keep freezing like this I won't be able to. My ping averages 35 and FPS is around 60-80. I have no idea what is going on and SOMEONE PLS HELP.

P.S. I am on a Mac operating system so don't dog me it's a good computer. Don't say get a pc aswell.

replies.body:
For something like that, getting a PC probably won't change it. Unless it's a software conflict, in which case just getting another Mac might fix it.

Point is, you don't have to buy a new computer to play League.

Do you have any firewalls or anti-virus installed? Who's your ISP?
